Images Not giving it 5 stars until I can add custom images.
Slowness I mean it good but can u fix it so thats it isn't laggy and slow after that I'll rate 5 ?
grab this for more easily

Photo uploading is decidedly broken. The multi picker works great  but it is a coin toss whether each individual photo will upload successfully or hang at 80% and go nowhere. The only way to fix hung uploads is to delete it and then browse through your photos again to try once more. This is a huge burden when you upload 20 photos and 5 of them hang. This behavior is consistent whether on wifi or data. What's more  the only intuitive options for a poat are ""local draft"" or ""publish"". I can't get the app to default to ""draft""  in which it is uploaded and able to be edited on my computer. Even if I only have the app as a way to upload cell photos  it is almost worthless at that.
It is sooooooo cool
Simple and just better Maybe you can consider to follow Lollipop design caused in the notification drop down only OS Monitor still in black color  thanks
GOOD GOOD

Got potential It's a bit too slow and unbalanced for my liking  but it has potential. Could use some form of sound  too. I'm not a fan of the percentage based experience point loss when killed. It's hard enough to level up  and fleeing doesn't always work.

Used to be great.. then I had to switch because of wrong dates (and therefore sorting) on some messages  lack of swipes  a crash constantly occurring when receiving some type of messages (probably malformed but no other client I have tried crashed because of that)  and missing features in notifications.

Seems to work fine. I've been using it to log hikes. the only problem i have is I can't get it to log to the SD card. (may be because I'm not too familiar with Android) If someone can give me a hint as to how to store the log on SD card I'll be a happy boy and will up it to 5 stars.

Simple & Strong tool for memorizing.. Love the statistics. Wish I had the option to set pre-configured card settings. Thanks.

AntennaPod Simple  handy player and downloader. Like the speed controls and jump forward and back buttons. Would be useful to have up / down speed buttons instead of a one-way scroll. Embedded player is accessible from file list that includes files not d/led with the app  though in this use it doesn't remember the position of paused files.
